name: prising
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
prise
to use force to lift something off something else, for example by pressing a tool against a fixed point or to separate things using force: I managed to prise the lid off the tin of paint. She prised the child's fingers apart and forced him to give her the coins. Synonym
jimmy US
